RelatedSentence: The Security Council of the United Nations is scheduled to hold a special discussion , Monday , on the UN Relief and Works Agency 's contribution to the perpetuation of the refugee status of the Arabs it serves as a tool for defaming Israel .
The discussion will feature Middle East experts , historians and legal experts .

Studies in recent years show that UNRWA schools teach a curriculum of a return by Arabs who left Israel when the modern Jewish state was founded , glorification of murderous terrorists , delegitimization of Israel and the desire for its destruction .
